1.Title: Purging Karmic Fire
1.Description: CRIT Rate increases by <color=#2BAD00>20%</color>. When the equipper launches an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, their <color=#FF5521>Fire Sheer DMG</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>9%</color>, stacking up to 2 times and lasting 20s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
